snippet: WEINRIB--Jerome. High Ridge Country Club acknowledges with sorrow the passing of our esteemed member, Jerome Weinrib. We extend our deepest sympathy to his beloved wife, Bernice, and their family. Robert D. Lang, President Harvey Karofsky, Secretary 1/3
lead_paragraph: WEINRIB--Jerome. High Ridge Country Club acknowledges with sorrow the passing of our esteemed member, Jerome Weinrib. We extend our deepest sympathy to his beloved wife, Bernice, and their family. Robert D. Lang, President Harvey Karofsky, Secretary 1/3
